forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in overnight. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near -0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening then light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning. Light rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become a mixture of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then periods of snow expected later at night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
